mountains.name: Mount Everest
mountains.description: The highest mountain on Earth above sea level, reaching an elevation of 8,848.86 meters.

mountains.name: Mount Fuji
mountains.description: An active stratovolcano and a sacred symbol of Japan, famous for its exceptionally symmetrical cone.

mountains.name: Matterhorn
mountains.description: A pyramid-shaped peak in the Alps, known as one of the deadliest peaks for climbers in the 19th century.

mountains.name: Mount Kilimanjaro
mountains.description: The highest mountain in Africa and the highest single free-standing mountain in the world.

mountains.name: Denali
mountains.description: The highest mountain peak in North America, formerly known as Mount McKinley.
